categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: R'han was a H'drachi Rebel on M'haeli and son of Lord Ph'dan. He was presumed dead after an Imperial attack in 0 ABY, but was in truth captured and put to work in Governor Grigor's dragite crystal mine. A group of local rebels led by Mora freed R'han and the other prisoners during an attack on the mine.
